Articles.Content:
How many times Jeb asked you for a cup of coffee while in space, and you couldn't give him because there are no coffee-makers in spaceships?

Apart from jokes, they are really planning to send one, called ISSpresso, to the ISS this year:

http://www.argotec.it/argotec/index.php/about_us

press release

http://www.argotec.it/argotec//docs/CS_ISSpresso_en.pdf
Hopefully they don't drink before bed time. I heard it could be quite the challenge getting to sleep on the ISS
